You’ve made a wise choice protecting your precious metals investments with a top tier, third-party vault provider through GoldSilver.com.

As a reminder, all of our storage locations are under 24/7 surveillance with armed guards, class 3 vaults, and carry full replacement value insurance at all times – all for a fraction of the cost of home insurance, and highly competitive with most “paper gold” products.

A payment was successfully applied to your balance due for storage services – which includes the cost of vaulting, insurance, auditing and all other services.

Please save a copy of this receipt or your paid invoices, as for most taxpayers in the U.S. at least this is a deductible cost for investment management or can positively impact cost basis for tax purposes. Always consult with a local tax advisor, of course. Payment confirmation:
